Hi Matthew,

Thanks for your immediate response.  I basically need to integ=
rate both Junit and Nunit test cases in a common platform.

Else will put i=
t in this way. There are few test cases which are in TestNG and few with Nu=
nit. What all the possible ways from which i can call and execute all the u=
nit tests? There shouldn't be to runs. On a single run both cases should pr=
oduce test results.

Thanks in advance.
